name: Children's Movement for Civic Awareness (CMCA)
briefDescription: CMCA is an 11 year old volunteer driven, civil society organization that conducts a national ‘civic club’ program in schools across India. This systematic and structured intervention is dedicated to moulding and nurturing active citizenship in children and youth across the country! CMCA seeks to sensitize children and youth to civic & democratic issues thereby improving quality & equality of life.Today, CMCA works with 321 schools, running 392 civic clubs and impacting over 19000 children every year, across 6 cities.
